ing: 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste (optional)
des: "Easy earthy side dish or on it's own with some good crusty bread and a glass of wine. Add grilled vegetables for vegetarian entree."
ins: In a medium saucepan, combine beans, tomatoes, olive oil, garlic and red pepper flakes.  Stir over medium heat until mixture begins to bubble.  Remove from heat and mix in the feta cheese and cilantro.
